title: ElGamal Message
description: A message that has been encrypted using exponential ElGamal.

public_key.description: The one-time public key `a = gʳ`, where `r` is the randomly generated one-time public key.

ciphertext.description: The encoding `b = gᵐ hʳ`, where `m` is the cleartext and `h` is the recipient public key being used for encryption.
